full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I GTOR 'BUL 'KHYER BDE DGA' SKYED MA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(DE LTAR DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'KHYER BDE BA 'DI NI, BLA MA LHA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN @004B ZHING YI GE'I RIG BYED 'DZIN PA'I RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA CHING PI LIG THU THU RU MUNG KHUS RGYAD RID MO NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN GZUGS ^DAM TSIG RDO RJE SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MOS DUS RTAG TU DGYES BZHIN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
